entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 11.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 6:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 11.2°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 10.2°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
